verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tumaini letu Mama,
Mama Maria,
tumaini letu Mama, ee Mama,
mwema ndiwe tumaini letu
wewe Mama yetu Maria. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Tuna tumaini kwako
Mama yetu,
tunakuja mbele yako,
tunaleta maombi
yetu kwako,
ee Mama utusikilize,
utusaidie sisi wanao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hapa duniani kuna vishawishi
vingi vinavyotusonga sana,
tunashindwa tukiwa peke yetu,
ee Mama utusaidie
tuvishinde vishawishi vyote.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hapa duniani kuna
kuna mambo mengi,
yanayotutia giza,
tunaomba utuangazie,
ee Mama utuonyeshe
njia iendayo kwa
mwanao mbinguni.
